operations.summary: Returns a list of events for the date range provided

parameters.name: X-Partner-Token
parameters.description: Your secret partner token

parameters.name: X-User-Token
parameters.description: The token you recieved when you authenticated the user

parameters.name: start_on
parameters.description: an iso8601 date (YYYY-MM-DD) indicating the beginning of the date range to include events

parameters.name: end_on
parameters.description: an iso8601 date (YYYY-MM-DD) indicating the end of the date range to include events

parameters.name: X-Partner-Token
parameters.description: Your secret partner token

parameters.name: X-User-Token
parameters.description: The token you recieved when you authenticated the user

parameters.name: event[event_type_id]
parameters.description: ID of an event type returned by the events/available_types API

parameters.name: event[start_at]
parameters.description: Format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM-0600 i.e. 2015-07-04T13:00-0600

parameters.name: event[end_at]
parameters.description: Format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM-0600 i.e. 2015-07-04T13:00-0600

parameters.name: event[inviteable_tokens]
parameters.description:
An array of strings describing who to invite. Each token must include the class and ID of the Troop, Patrol, or User to invite.
              For example, to invite the whole troop, you would provide ['Troop-1211'], or to invite patrol 11911 and user 1223 and user 3344 then you would
              provide ['Patrol-11911', 'User-1223', 'User-3344']

parameters.name: event[camping_nights]
parameters.description: How many nights do you expect to camp?

parameters.name: event[hiking_miles]
parameters.description: Expected number of miles to be hiked

parameters.name: event[canoeing_miles]
parameters.description: Expected number of miles to be traveled by canoe

parameters.name: event[dues]
parameters.description: Fee for youth to attend

parameters.name: event[adult_fee]
parameters.description: Fee for adults to attend

parameters.name: event[send_invites_when]
parameters.description: Number of days before the event to send an invitation. Use 999 to indicate sending the invite immediately.

parameters.name: event[send_reminder_when]
parameters.description: Number of days before the event to send a reminder.

parameters.name: event[service_hours]
parameters.description: Number of service hours expected to be completed

operations.summary: Returns event types available for a troop

parameters.name: X-Partner-Token
parameters.description: Your secret partner token

parameters.name: X-User-Token
parameters.description: The token you recieved when you authenticated the user

operations.summary: Returns detailed information about an event

parameters.name: X-Partner-Token
parameters.description: Your secret partner token

parameters.name: X-User-Token
parameters.description: The token you recieved when you authenticated the user

parameters.name: X-Partner-Token
parameters.description: Your secret partner token

parameters.name: X-User-Token
parameters.description: The token you recieved when you authenticated the user

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: ID of the user for whom you are RSVP'ing. Must be within your scope as a user AND must be invited to the event.

parameters.name: status_cd
parameters.description: yes: Coming. no: Not coming. tbd: No clue.

parameters.name: X-Partner-Token
parameters.description: Your secret partner token

parameters.name: X-User-Token
parameters.description: The token you recieved when you authenticated the user

parameters.name: event_trackers[user_id]
parameters.description: ID of the user for whom you are RSVP'ing. Must be within your scope as a user AND must be invited to the event.

parameters.name: event_trackers[attendance_status_cd]
parameters.description: 0: Did not attend. 1: Attended. 2: No clue.

parameters.name: event_trackers[number_of_adult_guests]
parameters.description: How many adult guests will this person bring?

parameters.name: event_trackers[number_of_youth_guests]
parameters.description: How many youth guests will this person bring?

event_type.description: Type of the event (Campout, Hike, Meeting, etc)

activity_at.description: Start time of the event in 2014-11-20T02:00:00.000-06:00 format

end_at.description: End time of the event in 2014-11-20T02:00:00.000-06:00 format

color.description: Color of the event, as specified by the creator

text_color.description: Color for text that is visible on a background of the color of the event

is_registration_closed?.description: Indicates if registration for this event is closed.

payment_required_to_rsvp.description: Indicates if payment is required to RSVP for this event. You cannot RSVP through the API if this is true.

event_type.description: Type of the event (Campout, Hike, Meeting, etc)

activity_at.description: Start time of the event in 2014-11-20T02:00:00.000-06:00 format

end_at.description: End time of the event in 2014-11-20T02:00:00.000-06:00 format

rsvp_deadline.description: Date by which RSVPs must be submitted

payment_required_to_rsvp.description: Indicates if payment is required to RSVP for this event. You cannot RSVP through the API if this is true.

is_registration_closed?.description: Indicates if registration for this event is closed.

adult_fee.description: Event fees required for each adult attending

dues.description: Event fees required for each youth attending

camping_nights.description: Number of nights of camping that will occur at this event

hiking_miles.description: Number of hiking miles that will occur at this event

service_hours.description: Number of service hours per attendee that will occur at this event

canoeing_miles.description: Number of canoeing miles that will occur at this event

event_type_id.description: ID of the event type record

name.description: Name of the event type (Campout, Meeting, etc)

color.description: Color used to display events of this type on the TroopTrack calendar
